terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.welcome: Welcome to the website of H4HInsurance (“we,” “our,” or “us”). By accessing or using our website (h4hinsurance.com, the “Site”), you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Site.

acceptance_of_terms.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
content: These Terms govern your use of the Site. By accessing or using the Site, you represent that:
You are at least 18 years old.
You are a resident of the United States.
You agree to comply with these Terms.

license_to_use.title: a. License to Use the Site:
license_to_use.content: H4HInsurance grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to use the Site solely for personal, non-commercial purposes related to insurance services.

prohibited_activities.title: b. Prohibited Activities:
content: You agree not to:
Copy, distribute, or reproduce content from the Site without authorization.
Use the Site to upload or distribute harmful software.
Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the Site.
Use the Site for unlawful or fraudulent purposes.

site_modifications.title: c. Site Modifications:
site_modifications.content: H4HInsurance reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue the Site or any features thereof at any time without prior notice.

information_you_provide.title: 3. Information You Provide
content: To use certain features of the Site, you may need to provide personal information. By providing this information, you agree that:
The information is accurate, current, and complete.
You will update the information as necessary.
You consent to the use of your information as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

privacy.title: 4. Privacy
privacy.content: Your use of the Site is subject to our Privacy Policy, which explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information. By using the Site, you consent to the practices described in the Privacy Policy.

program_name_and_description.title: a. Program Name and Description:
program_name_and_description.content: H4HInsurance SMS Services may send you marketing and non-marketing messages, including transactional updates, promotions, special offers, and other relevant insurance-related information. Messages may be sent using automated technologies, such as autodialers or automatic telephone dialing systems.

message_frequency_and_cadence.title: b. Message Frequency and Cadence:
message_frequency_and_cadence.content: Message frequency will vary based on your engagement and preferences. For example, you may receive up to 9 messages per month.

message_and_data_rates.title: c. Message and Data Rates:
message_and_data_rates.content: We do not charge for Messages sent through the SMS Services. However, standard message and data rates imposed by your mobile provider may apply.

eligibility.title: d. Eligibility:
content: To receive SMS Services, you must be:
A resident of the United States.
18 years of age or older.

opt_in_agreement.title: e. Opt-In Agreement:
opt_in_agreement.content: By providing your mobile number, you voluntarily opt-in to the SMS Services and agree to receive recurring Messages at the mobile number provided. Opting in is not required to purchase any products or services.

opt_out_instructions.title: f. Opt-Out Instructions:
opt_out_instructions.content: To stop receiving Messages, reply STOP, QUIT, CANCEL, OPT-OUT, or UNSUBSCRIBE to any Message. You may continue to receive Messages for a short time while we process your request. To resume receiving Messages, reply START to a previous Message.

customer_care_contact_information.title: g. Customer Care Contact Information:
customer_care_contact_information.content: For assistance, reply HELP to any Message or contact us at

privacy_and_data_sharing.title: h. Privacy and Data Sharing:
privacy_and_data_sharing.content: Your personal data, including your SMS opt-in status, will only be shared with third-party service providers or vendors who assist in delivering SMS Services. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

disclaimer_and_liability.title: i. Disclaimer and Liability:
disclaimer_and_liability.content: The SMS Services are provided 'as-is' and may not always be available. H4HInsurance.com and its service providers are not responsible for failed or delayed Messages.

intellectual_property.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content, trademarks, and materials on the Site are the property of H4HInsurance or its licensors. You may not use any of our intellectual property without prior written consent.

no_professional_advice.title: a. No Professional Advice:
no_professional_advice.content: The content on the Site is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional, financial, or legal advice.

no_guarantee_of_results.title: b. No Guarantee of Results:
no_guarantee_of_results.content: We do not guarantee that insurance quotes or recommendations provided will meet your requirements. Always consult directly with insurance carriers or agents.

limitation_of_liability.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
content: To the fullest extent permitted by law:
H4HInsurance is not responsible for any damages arising from your use of the Site.
Our liability is limited to the amount you paid us for services accessed through the Site.

arbitration_and_dispute_resolution.title: 9. Arbitration and Dispute Resolution
arbitration_and_dispute_resolution.content: Any disputes arising from your use of the Site will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the Federal Arbitration Act. You waive the right to participate in class actions.

termination.title: 10. Termination
termination.content: H4HInsurance reserves the right to terminate your access to the Site for any violation of these Terms or misuse of the Site.

changes_to_these_terms.title: 11. Changes to These Terms
changes_to_these_terms.content: We may update these Terms periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. Continued use of the Site indicates your acceptance of the revised Terms.

contact_us.title: 12. Contact Us
content: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:
H4HInsurance
1000 NW 65th St, Suite 110
Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309
Email: info@h4hinsurance.com

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.commitment: H4HInsurance is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our website (h4hinsurance.com) and interact with our services.

pii.title: a. Personally Identifiable Information (PII)
pii.content: We collect information such as your name, address, phone number, email, date of birth, and other personal details necessary to provide insurance services. This may also include information about family members if required for the services.

npii.title: b. Non-Personally Identifiable Information (NPII)
npii.content: We may collect non-identifiable information such as demographic data, browser type, device details, and browsing activity on our website.

from_you.title: a. Information Provided by You
from_you.content: We collect information directly from you when you fill out forms on our website, contact us via phone or email, or provide details during an insurance consultation.

from_cookies.title: b. Information from Cookies
from_cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your browsing experience. These tools may collect data such as IP address, browser type, and pages viewed. Cookies help us personalize content, analyze usage, and improve website functionality.

how_we_use_your_information.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
content: Provide insurance quotes, policies, and related services.
Improve customer service and website functionality.
Communicate with you regarding your inquiries, policies, and updates.
Personalize your experience on our website.
Ensure compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

content.title: a. Insurance Providers and Partners
content.content: To deliver the services you request, we may share your information with insurance carriers, agents, and other service providers necessary for processing quotes or claims.

content.title: b. Third-Party Service Providers
content.content: We may share your information with vendors who assist with business operations such as IT support, analytics, or marketing. These parties are required to safeguard your information in compliance with this policy.

content.title: c. Text Messaging Opt-In Data
content.content: All the above categories exclude text messaging originator opt-in data and consent; this information will not be shared with any third parties for purposes unrelated to the services of the SMS campaign. We may share your Personal Data, including your SMS opt-in or consent status, with third parties that help us provide our messaging services. This includes, but is not limited to, platform providers, phone companies, and vendors assisting in the delivery of text messages.

content.title: d. Legal Requirements
content.content: We may disclose your information if required by law, such as in response to a subpoena or government request.

cookies_and_tracking_technologies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: Essential Cookies: Required for the website to function properly.
Analytics Cookies: Help us understand user behavior to improve the website.
Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences, such as language or location settings.
You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings, but this may affect website functionality.

how_we_protect_your_information.title: 6. How We Protect Your Information
content: Encryption for data transmitted between your device and our systems.
Firewalls and secure servers to protect stored data.
Regular audits and staff training to ensure compliance with privacy regulations.
While we strive to protect your information, no system is completely secure. Please contact us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access to your information.

your_privacy_rights.title: 7. Your Privacy Rights
content: Access, correct, or delete your personal information.
Opt out of marketing communications.
Limit data sharing with third parties.
To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details below.

childrens_privacy.title: 8. Children's Privacy
childrens_privacy.content: H4HInsurance does not knowingly collect information from individuals under 13 years of age. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected such information, we will delete it promptly.

changes_to_this_policy.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes_to_this_policy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly.

main_section.title: We Are Here to Service Your Insurance Needs
main_section.description: Insurance can leave you with a lot of questions, let us help you make the best informed decision.

services.title: Health Insurance
services.description: The Affordable Care Act offers resources to help reduce obstacles and provide healthcare access for those in need.

services.title: Life Insurance
services.description: Let us help you navigate the key to financial security.

services.title: Dental & Vision
services.description: We provide affordable dental and vision policies for your overall health.

services.title: Medicare
services.description: Finding the right medicare supplement can be challenging, we are here to help.

enrollment_section.title: Enroll Now! Open Enrollment Ends january 15th.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: Discover our mission, vision, and the journey that drives our passion for healthcare access.

sections.heading: A Personal Mission: From Immigrant Experience to Empowerment
sections.paragraph: Founded by a Haitian immigrant with first-hand experience of the unique challenges Haitians face when trying to access the American Dream, our mission is deeply personal.

sections.heading: A Vision for Holistic Empowerment
sections.paragraph: Like everyone else, he envisions helping the Haitian community gain access to essential opportunities such as healthcare, education, jobs, networks, housing, nutrition, investing, and personal growth. His wife, also of Caribbean descent, shares this vision and dreams of expanding these efforts to all Caribbean Islands. While our goal is to support all underserved communities, our team is particularly focused on Haitians, who are among the most underserved. Health is the foundation of life, which is why we begin our work here.

sections.heading: Bridging the Healthcare Gap for Haitians
sections.paragraph: Access to quality healthcare is vital for the well-being of individuals and families, yet many in the Haitian community face significant barriers to obtaining proper health coverage. Language differences, lack of information, and financial constraints are just a few of the obstacles that prevent them from accessing the care they need. Our mission is to bridge this gap by providing Creole-speaking resources to help Haitian individuals and families navigate the complex healthcare system and secure the coverage necessary for a healthier future.

sections.heading: Expanding Access to Quality Healthcare Services
sections.paragraph: Whether they need Medicaid, health insurance, Medicare, or life insurance, we believe that everyone deserves access to high-quality service and support. Looking ahead, we aim to expand our outreach, ensuring that every member of the Haitian community has the knowledge and resources to protect their health and well-being.

dental_vision.title: Dental & Vision
dental_vision.description: Affordable Dental & Vision Insurance Plans for Your Family

first_section.title: Affordable Dental & Vision Insurance Plans for Your Family
first_section.description: Finding the right dental insurance doesn't have to be complicated—or expensive. We offer a range of affordable plans that make it easy to get the dental care you need. Plus, you can even bundle your plan with vision and hearing 👂 coverage for complete care, all in one package.

benefits.title: Enroll Anytime
benefits.description: There is no need to wait for open enrollment—you can sign up for coverage year-round!

benefits.title: Fast Activation
benefits.description: Enroll today, and your coverage could begin as soon as next month.

benefits.title: Coverage Anywhere
benefits.description: Our plans are available across the country, making it easy for nearly anyone to get covered.

need_insurance_section.title: Why Do You Need Dental Insurance?
need_insurance_section.description: Regular dental check-ups help catch issues before they become costly, ensuring you maintain a healthy smile. From routine cleanings to more serious procedures, dental insurance makes care more affordable, giving you peace of mind and protecting your wallet.
need_insurance_section.call_to_action: Get Started Today! Explore our plans and see how easy it is to protect your smile.

sections.title: Plans for Your Family's Needs
sections.description: Finding the right health plan for your family is easier than ever! Our Health Insurance options offer a wide variety of plans tailored to fit your needs and budget. From comprehensive coverage to affordable options, we've got you covered.

sections.title: Health Insurance Helps You Save
sections.description: Without coverage, even a single hospital visit can result in thousands of dollars in medical bills. Health insurance helps you manage these costs by sharing the burden and ensuring you pay a fraction of what you would otherwise.
sections.call_to_action: Ready to protect what matters most?

sections.title: What Does Health Coverage Include?
sections.description: Here are some of the Essential Benefits the ACA plan includes:

sections.title: What are Out-of-Pocket Expenses?
sections.description: Out-of-pocket expenses are the costs you pay directly for healthcare services that aren't covered by your health insurance plan. Understanding these costs is crucial to budgeting for your healthcare needs and preventing unexpected financial strain.

list.description: The fixed monthly payment you make to keep your health insurance active.
The amount you must pay for covered healthcare services before your insurance starts to pay.
A fixed amount you pay for specific services like doctor visits or prescriptions.
A percentage of the costs you share with your insurance company after meeting your deductible.
When comparing insurance plans, it's crucial to review all costs. Explore the best plan to fit your healthcare needs and budget. Connect with our licensed agent today!

main_section.title: Protect Your Loved Ones with Life Insurance
main_section.description: Life is unpredictable, but your family's future doesn't have to be. Life insurance provides peace of mind, knowing that your family or dependents will be financially protected if the unexpected happens. It can be especially crucial if you:
key_points: Have dependents, like children or a spouse, who rely on your income.
Carry significant debt, such as a mortgage, loans, or credit card debt.
Want to ensure your family has financial support for education, daily expenses, or long-term financial stability.

types.title: Term Life Insurance
types.description: Affordable coverage for a set period (10, 20, 30 years). Great for short-term needs like income replacement or mortgage protection.

types.title: Whole Life Insurance
types.description: Lifelong coverage that includes a cash value component, building savings over time.

types.title: Universal Life Insurance
types.description: Flexible policy with the potential for cash value growth, allowing you to adjust premiums and coverage as your needs change.

quote_section.title: Get a Personalized Quote... Take the First Step Today!
quote_section.description: Your family's future is too important to leave to chance. Start securing your financial legacy today by exploring our life insurance options. Get your free quote and take the first step towards peace of mind.

main_section.title: Medicare Coverage Made Simple, Affordable, and Tailored to Your Needs.
main_section.description: Turning 65 and navigating Medicare can be overwhelming, but we're here to help. Whether you're enrolling for the first time, exploring additional coverage options, or switching plans, we'll guide you every step of the way.

plans_section.title: What Medicare Plan Is Right for You?

plans.title: Medicare Advantage (Part C)
plans.description: Medicare Advantage plans combine hospital insurance (Part A) and medical insurance (Part B) into one plan. Many of these plans also offer prescription drug coverage (Part D), along with extra benefits like vision, dental, and hearing.

plans.title: Medicare Supplement (Medigap)
plans.description: Medicare Supplement plans help cover out-of-pocket costs that traditional Medicare doesn't, such as copayments, coinsurance, and deductibles. Choose from a variety of plans designed to save you money and protect you from high medical bills

plans.title: Prescription Drug Plans (Part D)
plans.description: Get coverage for prescription medications with a Part D plan. You'll have access to a broad network of pharmacies and coverage for the drugs you need.

compare_section.title: Compare Medicare Plans Now!
compare_section.description: Don't leave your healthcare to chance. Explore our Medicare plans today and find coverage that keeps you healthy, protected, and worry-free. With our expert guidance and simple tools, you can confidently choose the best plan for your needs.
compare_section.expert_text: with a licensed Medicare expert today!

make_difference.title: How We Make a Difference
make_difference.description: Our mission is to improve the lives of Haiti's underserved populations by providing access to affordable and comprehensive health insurance. We believe that everyone, regardless of their financial situation, deserves quality healthcare. By breaking down financial barriers and promoting awareness of available health services, we are working to ensure that more Haitian families can lead healthier, more secure lives.

stronger_haiti.title: Together, We are Building a Stronger, Healthier Haiti, One Policy at a Time.
stronger_haiti.description: Investing in Haitian communities is not just a moral imperative; it's a catalyst for sustainable growth and positive change.

breaking_barriers.title: Breaking Down Barriers for Equity and Growth
breaking_barriers.description: The Haitian community often faces systemic barriers that limit access to essential resources, such as education, healthcare, and economic opportunities. By directing investments into these areas, we can foster equity, create pathways for success, and strengthen the broader economy.

unlocking_potential.title: Unlocking Potential for a Thriving Future
unlocking_potential.description: Empowering Haitians unlocks their full potential, generating innovation, cultural diversity, and a more inclusive society. When we uplift our own, we build a future where everyone thrives

appointment.title: Appointment Scheduling
appointment.subtitle: Effortlessly schedule your appointment with flexible options and receive instant confirmation via email.

services.title: Face-to-Face Meeting

services.title: Virtual Consultation
services.description: Connect with us online through a virtual meeting. Get the same expert advice from the comfort of your home.
